p: On the global level, comments ascribing responsibility to the global or international community were grouped under the global community actor group category. Comments were encouraging global altruism in vaccination initiatives to increase vaccination rates around the world (e.g. “. . . The entire world must help the entire world get vaccinated”). In addition, commenters were also concerned about the moral implications pertaining to vaccine inequity as privileged countries produced and purchased more vaccines than less privileged countries. One commenter writes in that regard, “I am concerned about rich countries buying up vaccines and smaller, less rich countries trying to compete for those vaccines. Ignoring the moral implications, this is not be good for our world.”
